mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments (payment_number, non_order_no, payment_method, total_amount, shipping_fee, used_points, used_reward, actual_payment_amount, payment_time) VALUES(#{payment_number}, #{non_order_no}, #{payment_method}, #{total_amount}, #{shipping_fee}, #{used_points}, #{used_reward}, #{actual_payment_amount}, #{payment_time})
